channel.title: Johnny Rocket Fingers
channel.description:
The adventures of Johny Rocket Fingers are very enjoyable. It's a flash series made by a guy named Ryan from www.crackedanimations.com. I beat both Johnny Rocketfingers 1 and 2, and both of them are a lot of fun! [url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/78995]Johnny Rocketfingers 1[/url] [url=http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/310635]Johnny Rocket Fingers 2[/url] Since these are puzzle action adventure games, they do get pretty tough. THIS IS A SPOILER! DON'T LOOK UNLESS YOU HAVE TO! ------------------------------------------------------
Pick up bottle on your right Use bottle on countertop Pick up ashes Use ashes on thugs Pick up card on the floor Pull chain on ceiling Take knife Check under the couch Use key on window Take gum on the wall Combine gum and chain Go down the ladder Check the trash can Go into liquor shop Pick up the 40 bottle Use 40 bottle on crack on the wall Go outside and check out the crack on the wall Give 40 bottle to bum Take the bumâ€™s can Go back into the shop, take seltzer, talk to clerk to buy it Combine seltzer with bread Go back up the ladder and feed the pigeon with combined bread Check the nest Go back down the ladder again Use hairpin on parking meter Talk to the shady looking guy on the right side of liquor shop Keep asking about Thug Inc information, do him a favour by finding his zippo Go into alley and use knife on trashbag Use knife on drain and go down Use wrench on pipe Clim into the hole, put burger outside the hole and use pipe on crocodile Use wrench on wheel Turn the wheel Use single coin on panel and use knife to open the panel Click on the panel and use G2 scrabble piece on missing button Click on the G2 button Keep walking left until you see treasure Use the combined gum and chain on lighter on top of the treasure pile Go back up and give the lighter to the guy, ask him where is the location of Thug Inc Keep going left until you see bus. Use the coin pile on the bus Sit back and watch the ending.
------------------------------------------------------ Enjoy the game! ~Ron

item.title: Johnny Rocket Fingers
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh just saw that on NG forums lol. I’ll edit the post.

item.title: Johnny Rocket Fingers
item.dc:creator: @beegee7730 beegee7730
item.description:
@beegee7730 wrote:

Pick up bottle on your right
Use bottle on countertop
Pick up ashes
Use ashes on thugs
Pick up card on the floor
Pull chain on ceiling
Take knife
Check under the couch
Use key on window
Take gum on the wall
Combine gum and chain
Go down the ladder
Check the trash can
Go into liquor shop
Pick up the 40 bottle
Use 40 bottle on crack on the wall
Go outside and check out the crack on the wall
Give 40 bottle to bum
Take the bumâ€™s can
Go back into the shop, take seltzer, talk to clerk to buy it
Combine seltzer with bread
Go back up the ladder and feed the pigeon with combined bread
Check the nest
Go back down the ladder again
Use hairpin on parking meter
Talk to the shady looking guy on the right side of liquor shop
Keep asking about Thug Inc information, do him a favour by finding his zippo
Go into alley and use knife on trashbag
Use knife on drain and go down
Use wrench on pipe
Clim into the hole, put burger outside the hole and use pipe on crocodile
Use wrench on wheel
Turn the wheel
Use single coin on panel and use knife to open the panel
Click on the panel and use G2 scrabble piece on missing button
Click on the G2 button
Keep walking left until you see treasure
Use the combined gum and chain on lighter on top of the treasure pile
Go back up and give the lighter to the guy, ask him where is the location of Thug Inc
Keep going left until you see bus. Use the coin pile on the bus
Sit back and watch the ending.

Read full topic

item.title: Johnny Rocket Fingers
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The adventures of Johny Rocket Fingers are very enjoyable. It’s a flash series made by a guy named Ryan from www.crackedanimations.com.

I beat both Johnny Rocketfingers 1 and 2, and both of them are a lot of fun!

Johnny Rocketfingers 1
Johnny Rocket Fingers 2

Since these are puzzle action adventure games, they do get pretty tough.

THIS IS A SPOILER! DON’T LOOK UNLESS YOU HAVE TO!

Pick up bottle on your right
Use bottle on countertop
Pick up ashes
Use ashes on thugs
Pick up card on the floor
Pull chain on ceiling
Take knife
Check under the couch
Use key on window
Take gum on the wall
Combine gum and chain
Go down the ladder
Check the trash can
Go into liquor shop
Pick up the 40 bottle
Use 40 bottle on crack on the wall
Go outside and check out the crack on the wall
Give 40 bottle to bum
Take the bumâ€™s can
Go back into the shop, take seltzer, talk to clerk to buy it
Combine seltzer with bread
Go back up the ladder and feed the pigeon with combined bread
Check the nest
Go back down the ladder again
Use hairpin on parking meter
Talk to the shady looking guy on the right side of liquor shop
Keep asking about Thug Inc information, do him a favour by finding his zippo
Go into alley and use knife on trashbag
Use knife on drain and go down
Use wrench on pipe
Clim into the hole, put burger outside the hole and use pipe on crocodile
Use wrench on wheel
Turn the wheel
Use single coin on panel and use knife to open the panel
Click on the panel and use G2 scrabble piece on missing button
Click on the G2 button
Keep walking left until you see treasure
Use the combined gum and chain on lighter on top of the treasure pile
Go back up and give the lighter to the guy, ask him where is the location of Thug Inc
Keep going left until you see bus. Use the coin pile on the bus
Sit back and watch the ending.

Enjoy the game!

~Ron
